alert.note: Alert for Curry County Coast; South Central Oregon Coast (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued December 13 at 1:19AM PST until December 13 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Medford
info.description: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Large breaking waves of 20 to 25 feet. * WHERE...All area beaches along the southern Oregon Coast, including the beaches of Coos, Curry and Douglas Counties. * WHEN...Until 10 AM PST this morning. * IMPACTS...Large breaking waves will create hazardous conditions along and within the surf zone, and could inundate beaches and low lying shorelines. Beach erosion is possible, and exposed infrastructure may be damaged. * View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: Stay away from the surf zone and off of jetties. Area beaches may become hazardous due to dangerous surf conditions.

area.areaDesc: Curry County Coast; South Central Oregon Coast
